Posts.Content: I just received a call from the hospital. My wifes doctor has ordered a breast work up. What does that mean? She had a mamogram 6 months ago and another one last week.
Posts.Title: What is a breast work up?

Posts.Content: Thank you for responding, the hospital said that they want to do an additional mamogram and unltrasound. She has doctors appt on Jan 6th and scheduled at hospital Jan 11th. There ia a 90% chance that I have prostate cancer. I am praying for her, we both do not need to be fighting the war at the same time. Greg
Posts.Title: What is a breast work up?
